item.description: It’s that time again! The next Nutrient Dense Workshop with Dan is Sunday, May16th @ Udderly Woolly Acres in Glastonbury located at 581 Thompson St. We thank Tom & Joan for their hospitality. The farm # is (860) 633-4503; John’s cell is 860.983.1036 if you happen to get lost! Please carpool if you can and park on the road leading up to the farm. Wraps, fruit & dessert will be provided by Alchemy & Sun Tea by Joan. Please bring a reusable water bottle. We will meet outside the farmhouse at 10am. Dress for the outdoors and dream of a good weather day! See you at the farm!
item.name: Nutrient Dense Workshop with Dan Kittredge
